segments.text: You're just left school , haven't you , Emily ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , yes . I don't mind admitting that I am . I enjoyed school , but I did object to having to go in every day once we've done all our exams .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , what are you going to do now ? Have you made any plans ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I intend to go to university . That'll be in September . But it all depends on my A level results .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean getting into university actually depends on your passing your A level subjects ?
segments.speaker: S1
